snippet.title: Polity Trailer
snippet.description:
Polity
Play Early Access on Steam!
Release Date on Steam: 2022

Official Website: https://www.polityonline.com/
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1479480/Polity/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/polityonline
Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/polityonline/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/polityonline

A new civilization shapes on a planet covered with endless oceans! The floating platforms are countries to be built up by their citizens and presidents. Come and explore the world of Polity to find your own path! Either Rule or Serve your new country!
Snotra the AI welcomes her citizens, who will be the 'Early Settlers' in the era of Hope!
